snippet: In 1985, Phil Coppess ran the Twin Cities Marathon in 2 hours 10 minutes 5 seconds in 1985, a record that still stands.
abstract: Profile of Phil Coppess, who ran the 1985 Twin Cities Marathon in 2 hours 10 minutes 5 seconds, a record that still stands.
lead_paragraph: In 1985, Phil Coppess ran the Twin Cities Marathon in 2 hours 10 minutes 5 seconds in 1985, a record that still stands.

headline.seo: Phil Coppess Still Holds Twin Cities Marathon Record
headline.main: Self-Made Runner Remains in the Lead 27 Years Later
